class.name: AnimationNodeBlendTree
class.brief_description: [AnimationTree] node resource that contains many blend type nodes.
class.description: This node may contain a sub-tree of any other blend type nodes, such as [AnimationNodeTransition], [AnimationNodeBlend2], [AnimationNodeBlend3], [AnimationNodeOneShot], etc. This is one of the most commonly used roots. An [AnimationNodeOutput] node named [code]output[/code] is created by default.

method.name: add_node
method.description: Adds an [AnimationNode] at the given [code]position[/code]. The [code]name[/code] is used to identify the created sub-node later.

method.name: connect_node
method.description: Connects the output of an [AnimationNode] as input for another [AnimationNode], at the input port specified by [code]input_index[/code].

method.name: disconnect_node
method.description: Disconnects the node connected to the specified input.

method.name: get_node
method.description: Returns the sub-node with the specified [code]name[/code].

method.name: get_node_position
method.description: Returns the position of the sub-node with the specified [code]name[/code].

method.name: has_node
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if a sub-node with specified [code]name[/code] exists.

method.name: rename_node
method.description: Changes the name of a sub-node.

method.name: set_node_position
method.description: Modifies the position of a sub-node.

members.member: The global offset of all sub-nodes.

constants.constant: The specified input port is out of range.
Input and output nodes are the same.
